# Resources Docs

- [Best practices in Orleans](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/resources/best-practices.md): Learn some of the best practices in Orleans for .NET Orleans app development.
- [Frequently asked questions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/resources/frequently-asked-questions.md): Explore the frequently asked questions for .NET Orleans.
- [External links for .NET Orleans](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/resources/links.md): Explore external links for .NET Orleans.
- [Orleans NuGet packages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/resources/nuget-packages.md): Explore the many .NET Orleans NuGet packages.
- [Orleans architecture design principles](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/resources/orleans-architecture-principles-and-approach.md): Explore the architecture design principles for .NET Orleans.
- [Big and small thinking](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/resources/orleans-thinking-big-and-small.md): Learn how Orleans applies to both big and small distributed applications.
- [Student projects](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/resources/student-projects.md): Learn how the Orleans team encourages students to build distributed applications.
